Golem (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0075: Graveler
Pokémon
#0077: Ponyta →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Golem (TCG Pocket).

Golem has been featured on 21 different cards since it debuted in the Fossil expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Golem cards are normally Fighting-type or Lightning-type Stage 2 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Golem

Golem
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
